creator: kh@waikato.ac.nz
text:
During the late build stages the message appears that exports.c has been 
changed and needs re-compilation - a couple of files then compile OK but 
exports.c compilation reports around a hundred duplicate definition messages.

Looking at the file it consists of sections with a 'source' in comments at the 
head. All of the following sections are duplicates -

   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_allocator.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_atomic.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_dso.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_errno.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_file_info.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_file_io.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_fnmatch.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_general.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_getopt.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_global_mutex.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_hash.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_lib.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_mmap.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_network_io.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_poll.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_pools.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_portable.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_proc_mutex.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_shm.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_signal.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_strings.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_tables.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_thread_cond.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_thread_mutex.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_thread_proc.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_thread_rwlock.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_time.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_user.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr/include/apr_version.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_base64.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_buckets.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_date.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_dbm.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_hooks.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_md4.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_md5.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_optional.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_optional_hooks.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_reslist.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_rmm.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_sdbm.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_sha1.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_strmatch.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_uri.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_uuid.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_xlate.h
   * /usr/local/apache2/srclib/apr-util/include/apr_xml.h

     Since this is awk generated there must be some problem.  I configured as 
follows -

--enable-module=so --prefix=/usr/local/apache --enable-mods-shared=most 
--enable-ssl=shared --with-ssl=/usr/local/ssl

     Deleting the duplicates allowed make to complete.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
[This is a mass bug update.]
This bug reports a problem in an older version of Apache 2.
Could you please update to the most recent version and see
if you can reproduce this problem.  If the bug still exists,
please update the bug with the latest version number.  If 
the bug no longer exists, please close the bug report.

Sorry for this impersonal response, but we get many more bug
reports than our volunteers can keep up with.
Thanks for using Apache!

[This is a mass bug update.] [Resolve-20021102]
No response from submitter; assuming issue is resolved.
If the problem still exists in the lastest version,
please reopen this report and update appropriately.
creator: slive@apache.org
lehchr@bluewin.ch
text:
I have the save error with 2.0.45, when I compile in a path which contains a
softlink, then the generated filelist for the awk script for generating
exports.c does contains the same paths twice: as a softlink and the absolute
one. (lehchr@bluewin.ch)
